item.title: whyyyyy do we not use package managers everywhere?
item.description: I was doing some work in pandas and the append() function wouldn’t work as documented. Essentially, everything was conformable, but append() wouldn’t merge. Turns out I’m at least four versions behind on pandas, not to mention 3 versions of numpy and matplotlib. Having one program that updates all your software is so desirable at this point that I can’t understand why the independent application install model still exists. Even Microsoft has its standardized .
